Resistance.help: Jounin have improved Defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks. They are resistant to Confuse and Taunt and are excellent runners. They can use a Sting of the Wasp and a Gambler's Cut with their Ninja Blade. Jounin can also use Caltrops.

Hack.help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

You have been Placated and cannot target {PlayerSource}.

Train.help: This Jounin has been Trained. He can now use a Soaring Dragon with his Ninja Blade and can fire Poison Darts.

Head_Splitter.help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. If executed while hidden, only some affected targets may be hit with a Critical, however, there is a chance you may land a Critical hit with Head Splitter even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.targetHelp: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Blinding_Powder.help: Your have been blinded. You are helpless and confused.
Blinding_Powder.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} blinds {PlayerDest} with their {PowerName} putting them to sleep and reducing their chance to hit and perception!
Blinding_Powder.victimHit: {PlayerSource} blinds you with their {PowerName} putting you to sleep and reducing your chance to hit and perception!

Hide.help: The very essence of what makes a Stalker. Hide allows you to blend into your environment, making you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment related powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. Very low Endurance cost.

Enlighten.help: This Jounin has been Enlightened. He can now execute a Golden Dragonfly. He can also Hide and use Blinding Powder.
